      • login

        public User login(java.lang.String username,
         java.lang.String password)
           throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException
        Login using the username and password. If either the username or password are incorrect, an exception is thrown
        Parameters:
        username - Login Username
        password - Login Password
        Returns:
        The User object for the logged in user - may be any concrete User subclass
        Throws:
        javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - if either the username or password are incorrect
